# Solopreneur Sparring Partner

All-in-one sparring for indie founders and one-person startups

## Overview
This is a specialized Claude Code plugin designed for the **Solopreneur** domain.
It helps you track goals, detect patterns, and improve your workflow.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin install solopreneur-sparring@claude-code-skills
```

## Features

- **Domain-Specific**: Optimized for solopreneur workflows.
- **Goal Tracking**: Set and track solopreneur goals.
- **Pattern Detection**: Identifies patterns like feature_creep, solo_burnout, perfectionism_trap.

## Usage

```bash
/sparring goal "My new objective"
/sparring progress
```
